name: incapacitating
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
making someone unable to work or do things normally, or unable to do what they intended to do: Extreme shyness can be very incapacitating. She suffers from incapacitating migraine headaches. See
incapacitate
More examplesFewer examplesMy uncle struggled with an incapacitating mental disorder.Nerve damage can cause incapacitating pain and weakness.Extreme anxiety can be incapacitating.
